vote.title: An ordinance amending Chapter 34, “Personnel Rules,” of the Dallas City Code by amending Section 34-22.3; (1) expanding paid mental health leave for peace officers to all city employees; (2) providing a saving clause; (3) providing a severability clause; and (4) providing an effective date - Estimated amount of $705,600.00 annually - Financing: General Fund ($592,782.00), Enterprise Funds ($67,930.00), and Internal Service and Other Funds ($44,888.00) (see Fiscal Information)
